628:1: atha khalu bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin svapnadarśī puruṣaḥ svapnasvabhāvanirdeśaṃ ca nirdiśati,
628:8: tadyathāpiu nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin svapno na kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena pratyupasthitaḥ |
628:9: evameva prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena pratyupasthitā ||
628:10: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin māyādarśī puruṣo māyāsvabhāvanirdeśaṃ ca nirdiśati,
628:15: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin māyā na kasyaciddharmasya abhinirvṛttaye pratyupasthitā,

628:31: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin marīcirna kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena pratyupasthitā,

628:47: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin budbudadarśī puruṣo budbudasvabhāvaṃ ca nirdiśati,
628:52: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin budbudo na kasyaciddharmasya abhinirvṛttisvabhāvena pratyupasthitaḥ,
628:53: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya abhinirvittisvabhāvena pratyupasthitā ||
628:54: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin puruṣaḥ kadalyāḥ sāraṃ paryeṣamāṇo nopalabhate,

628:56: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sāraṃ na saṃvidyate,
628:58: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin puruṣa ākāśanidarśanena vyavahārati,
628:62: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin nākāśaṃ na vyavahriyate,

628:65: na ca kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena vā pariniṣpattyā vā vyavahriyate ||
628:66: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin chāyeti cātapaśceti vyavahriyate,
628:67: na ca tau kasyaciddharmasya pariniṣpattaye pratyupasthitau,
628:72: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin maṇiratnamuttaptaṃ mahatāvabhāsena pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati,
628:73: na ca so'vabhāso'dhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā darśanamupaiti |
628:75: na ca so'vabhāso'adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā darśanamupaiti ||
628:76: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin tailapradyotasya dhmāyato nāsyārciṣo muhūrtamapi saṃtiṣṭhante,

628:127: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśe na jātu kenacitpañcāṅgulipariniṣpattirdṛṣṭapūrvā,
628:129: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat-durdṛśeyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā |
628:132: āha-tathā hi śāradvatīputra nāsyāṃ kaścidupalabhyate yo'bhisaṃbuddhaḥ |
628:134: āha-tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena pratyupasthitā |
628:153: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputra bhagavantametadavocat-neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya pariniṣpattaye pratyupasthitā na nirodhāya |

628:169: āha- tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,

628:192: āha-neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya samatayā vā viṣamatayā vā pratyupasthitā |
628:193: āha-tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,

628:195: āha-neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃgrahāya vā asaṃgrahāya vā pratyupasthitā |

628:239: āha-neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃgrahāya vā parigrahāya vā pratyupasthitā |

628:246: āha-tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,

628:248: āha-neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya abhiniveśena pratyupasthitā |
628:249: āha-tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,

628:252: āha-tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
628:255: āha-neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃvāsena vā asaṃvāsena vā pratyupasthitā |
628:256: āha-tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,

628:259: āha-tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,

628:261: āha-neya bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya rāgeṇa vā virāgeṇa vā pratyupasthitā |
628:262: āha-tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,

628:273: āha-neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya prakṛtyā vā aprakṛtyā vā pratyupasthitā |
628:274: āha-tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya prakṛtiṃ vā samanupaśyati |
628:275: āha-neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya śuddhyā vā viśuddhyā vā pratyupasthitā |
628:276: āha-tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmaṃ samanupaśyati,
628:282: saṃskārapariśuddhito vijñānapariśuddhito nāmarūpapariśuddhitaḥ ṣaḍāyatanapariśuddhitaḥ pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā,

628:315: āha-tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya rūpapariniṣpattyā vā nidarśanena vā pratyupasthitā |
628:317: āha-tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmaṃ samanupaśyati yasmin pratihanyeta |
628:321: āha-tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmaṃ yena dharmeṇa sārdhaṃ samavasaret |
628:323: āha-tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate yena dharmeṇa prajñapyeta |
628:325: (āha-tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate yena dharmeṇa sādhāraṇā bhavet |
628:338: dānānantatayā śīlānantatayā kṣāntyanantatayā vīryānantatayā dhyānānantatayā prajñānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ prajñāpāramitā |
628:353: na hyasyāḥ śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vā paryavasānaṃ vā upalabhyate,
628:359: abdhātvanantatayā tejodhātvanantatayā vāyudhātvanantatayā vijñānadhātvanantatayā prajñāpāramitānantatā anugantavyā |
628:361: na hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā deśasthā na pradeśasthā |
628:365: avidyāparyantatayā saṃskārāparyantatayā vijñānāparyantatayā nāmarūpaṣaḍāyatanāparyantatayā yāvat jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāparyantatayā śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitāparyantatā anugantavyā |
628:369: dānānantatayā śīlānantatayā kṣāntyanantatayā vīryānantatayā dhyānānantatayā prajñānantatayā śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitānantatā anugantavyā |
628:373: abhijñāparyantatayā vimuktyaparyantatayā vimuktijñānadarśanāparyantatayā śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitāparyantatā anugantavyā |

628:375: vidyāparyantatayā vimuktyaparyantatayā vimuktijñā[nadarśa]nāparyantatayā śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitāparyantatā anugantavyā |
628:381: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat-kīdṛśānāṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāmeṣu dharmeṣu viṣayaḥ ?
628:382: bhagavānāha-ye te śāradvatīputra bodhisattvā dharmamapi nopalabhante prāgevādharmam,
628:384: śīlamapi nopalabhante na manyante prāgeva dauḥśīlyam,
628:387: anadhyavasitāśca kāye jīvite ca prāgeva bāhyeṣu vastuṣu,
628:391: teṣāṃ śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmeṣu dharmeṣu viṣayaśca gatiśca,
628:392: sarvaviṣayā aviṣayā iti ca yeṣāṃ parijānante (parijñānam ?)
628:401: yeṣāṃ śāradvatīputra eṣu dharmeṣu viṣayo gatiśca |
628:402: nāhaṃ śāradvatīputra asyāṃ parṣadi samanupaśyāmi ekamapi bodhisattvam,
628:403: yasya naiṣu dharmeṣu viṣayo vā adhimuktirvā,
628:404: yo vā eṣu dharmeṣu sākāṅkṣo vā savicikitso vā |
628:405: niṣkāṅkṣeyaṃ śāradvatīputra parṣadeṣu dharmeṣu nirvicikitsā nirvaimatikā |
628:406: nāsti śāradvatīputra eṣāṃ bodhisatvānāmeṣu dharmeṣu vimatiḥ |
628:407: vimatisamuddhātāya śāradvatīputra ete satpuruṣāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sthitāḥ |
628:408: niḥsaṃśayā hyete śāradvatīputra eṣvevaṃrūpeṣu dharmeṣu saṃśayasamatikrāntāḥ ||
628:409: ye'pi te śāradvatīputra paścime kāle paścime samaye imāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śroṣyanti,
628:413: nāhaṃ śāradvatīputra parīttakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāmeṣu dharmeṣvadhimuktiṃ vadāmi |
628:416: nāpi te śāradvatīputra sattvāḥ parīttakuśalamūlasamanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
628:417: yeṣāmiyaṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śrotrapathamapyāgamiṣyati kimaṅga punarye udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti |
628:420: evaṃ ca te siṃhanādaṃ nadiṣyanti yathāhametarhi siṃhanādaṃ nadāmi astambhitanādaṃ mahāpuruṣanādaṃ svayaṃbhūnādam |
628:421: ye eṣu dharmeṣvatyantaśaḥ śraddhāṃ janayitvā chandaṃ janayiṣyanti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
628:425: ya imān gambhīrān dharmān śrutvā prītiṃ ca vindanti,
628:429: ye gambhīrān dharmān śrutvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayanti,
628:431: nāhaṃ śāradvatīputra tān sattvān mahāsaṃsārasaṃprasthitāniti vadāmi yeṣāmayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaḥ śravaṇapathamapyāgamiṣyati,
628:433: paṭhiṣyanti adhimokṣyanti udāraṃ ca prītisaumanasyaṃ janayiṣyanti,
628:434: eṣu dharmeṣu chandaṃ janayiṣyanti punaḥ punaḥ śravaṇāyāpi,
628:435: kaḥ punarvādaḥ uddeṣṭuṃ vā svādhyātuṃ vā parebhyo deśayituṃ vā |
628:436: vyākaromyahaṃ śāradvatīputra anavakrāntaniyāmān aniyatān śrāvakapratyekabuddhayāne anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhauḥ |
628:437: nāhaṃ śāradvatīputra hīnadharmasamanvāgatānāṃ sattvānāmagrato dharmeṣvavakāśaṃ samanupaśyāmi|
628:439: yadbhūyasā ca sattvā hīnādhimuktikā hīnadharmasamanvāgatā akṛtakalyāṇāḥ |
628:441: ye punaste śāradvatīputra udārāḥ sattvā udāradharmādhimuktā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ supariprāptakāryāḥ susaṃnāhasaṃnaddhāḥ suvicitrārthā mahāmārgeṇa saṃprasthitā aviṣameṇa ṛjunā,
628:442: agahanena samena apagatakhāṇukaṇṭakena apagataśvabhraprapātena śucinā apagatakilbiṣeṇa akuṭilena avaṅkena,
628:443: ye lokahitāya saṃprasthitā lokasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya va devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca,
628:447: teṣāṃ śāradvatīputra tathārūpāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmidaṃ mahādhanam |
628:448: ta eva ca śāradvatīputra mahāsattvā asya dharmaratnasya pratyeṣakāḥ |
628:451: na hi śāradvatīputra akṛtapuṇyānāṃ sattvānāmakṛtakalyāṇānāṃ hīnādhimuktikānāṃ śraddhāvihīnānāmasminnudāre dhane'dhimuktirjāyate |
628:452: etacca me śāradvatīputra saṃdhāya bhāṣitam-dhātuśaḥ satvāḥ saṃsyandanti hīnādhimuktikā hīnādhimuktikaiḥ,
628:454: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat-kiṃgocarā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā ?
628:460: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśadhāturvāyudhātuśca na kvacitsaṃdṛśyete,
628:462: evameva śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kvaciddharme saṃdṛśyate,
628:464: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśadhāturvāyudhātuśca agrāhyāpariniṣpattito na varṇanimittena saṃkhyāṃ gacchataḥ,
628:465: evameva śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā agrāhyāniṣpattito na kenacidvarṇanimittena saṃkhyāṃ gacchati vā upaiti vā |
628:466: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśadhāturvāyudhātuśca na kasyaciddharmasya pariniṣpattidarśanenopayātau,
628:470: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśadhātuśca vāyudhātuśca na kasyaciddharmasya pariciṣpattilakṣaṇenopagacchataḥ,
628:471: evameva śāradavtīputra prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya pariniṣpattilakṣaṇenopaiti |
628:475: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśadhāturvāyudhātudhca na kasyaciddharmasya pariniṣpattilakṣaṇenopagacchataḥ,
628:486: na ca asaṅgasya lakṣaṇaṃ na nimittam |
628:491: na hi śāradvatīputra saṅge saṅgo cidyate,
628:516: api tu khalu punaḥ sattvānāmetadasaṅgalakṣaṇanidarśanaṃ kṛtam |
628:536: yo'bhūtaḥ, tatra bhūtasya pariniṣpattirvā lakṣaṇaṃ vā nāsti |
628:553: n ahi śāradvtīputra gocaranidarśanalakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā bhāvyate |
628:554: viṣaya iti śāradvatīputra aviṣaya e ṣa dharmāṇām eṣā yathābhūtatā,
628:564: eṣvevaṃrūpeṣu śāradvatīputra dharmeṣu na bahavaḥ sahāyakāḥ pratilabhyante |
628:567: na hyeṣu śāradvatīputra dharmeṣu kaścidanyaḥ sahāyaḥ,
628:569: teṣāmapi tāvacchāradvatīputra dṛṣṭisaṃpannānāmeṣu dharmeṣu caritānāṃ saṃśayaḥ syāt |
628:570: niḥsaṃśayaḥ śāradvatīputra kāyasākṣī ca bodhisattvaśca pratilabdhakṣāntikaḥ |
628:572: nāyaṃ śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitānirdeśo hīnādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ hastaṃ gamiṣyati |
628:576: kṛtādhikārā buddheṣu bhagavatsu bodhāyāvaropitabuddhabījā buddhayānasamārūḍhā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmāsannasthāyino yoniśaḥ praśnapṛcchakāḥ,
628:585: atha ca śāradvatīputra vyākṛtā eva te mantavyāḥ saṃmukhavyākaraṇena |
628:586: na hi śāradvatīputra aparipakvakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāmayaṃ sūtrāntaḥ śrotrapathamapyāgamiṣyati,
628:587: kimaṅga punaryadetaṃ sūtrāntaṃ pratilabheran vā lekhayeyurvā ārādhayeyurvā uddiśeyurvā dhyāyeran vā,
628:591: ya imaṃ sūtrāntaṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti svādhyāsyanti |
628:592: kiṃcāpi śāradvatīputra uttaptakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāmayaṃ dharmaparyāyo hastaṃ gamiṣyati |
628:593: api tu khalu punaḥ śāradvatīputra ārocayāmi te,
628:595: na tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bodhisattvayānīyena vā śrāvakayānīyena vā imān dharmān pratilabhya alpotsukena bhavitavyam,
628:596: kusīdena vā middhabahulena vā asaṃprajñena vā anupasthitasmṛtinā vā vikṣiptacittena vā āmiṣagṛddhena vā lolena vā mukhareṇa vā tundena vā pragalbhena vā prākṛtendriyeṇa vā |
628:597: kiṃcāpi śāradvatīputra kuśalamūlāni kṛtāni na visaṃvādayanti |
628:598: api tu khalu imān dharmān labdhvā bodhisattvena bhūyasyā mātrayā apramādaśca vīryaṃ ca utsāhaśca chandaśca akausīdyaṃ ca saṃvṛtendriyatā ca amukharatā cāsevitavyā,
628:602: yadbodhisattvo vā śrāvakayāniko vā evaṃrūpān dharmān śrutvā pramādamāpadyeta,
628:609: nāpi tena ime evaṃrūpā dharmāḥ śrutā bhaveyuḥ |
628:612: na hi śāradvatīputra vipratipannena ayaṃ dharmaḥ śruto bhavati|
628:617: kṣāntisaṃpannasya śāradvatīputra pudgalasya pratipattisthitasya na bhūyo'pāyagamanaṃ bhavati,
628:622: yaḥ śāradvatīputra eṣu dharmeṣu pariniṣpannaḥ śikṣito labdhakṣāntirna bhūyasā apāyagamanasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma kuryāt |
628:623: na cāsya bhūyaḥ kausīdyaṃ vā hīnabhāgīyaṃ vā bhavet |
628:627: parijñāto hi śāradvatīputra tena bhavati saṃkleśaśca vyavadānaṃ ca,
628:628: dṛṣṭaṃ ca tena yathābhūtaṃ bhavati-sarvadharmā viparyāsasamutthitā abhūtā iti |
628:629: sa evaṃ samyagdarśī kṣāntisaṃpanno bhavati sūrato'mandavān (?)
628:631: devā api śāradvatīputra tathārūpebhyaḥ spṛhayanti prāgeva manuṣyāḥ |
628:632: devānāmapi te tathārūpāḥ sattvāḥ spṛhaṇīyā bhavanti prāgeva manuṣyāṇām |
628:633: devānāmapi te satkārārhā bhavanti prāgeva manuṣyāṇām |
628:634: devairapi te rakṣaṇīyā bhavanti prāgeva manuṣyaiḥ |
